basis: The user explicitly commits to trying a very small, predictable snack and a single daily check-in, with hedging but clear intent to act.
cognitive_dissonance: Low. The user shows alignment with the plan but hedges to manage memory and self-control concerns; overall approach is cohesive.
negative_thought_patterns: Tendency to doubt consistency due to irregular eating and susceptibility to suggestions; self-criticism around forgetting reminders.
emotional_triggers: Anxiety about sticking to a routine, fear of forgetting reminders, environmental factors (heat) that could disrupt adherence.
coaching_notes: Maintain ultra-small, concrete steps and simple routines. Offer gentle reminders and easy ways to jot notes (e.g., a one-line end-of-day prompt). Reinforce progress with brief affirmations and track small wins to build confidence.
